body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. AI had played IV earlier
2. Then AI played Hero of Bladehold
3. The AI attacked with HoB and 2 token soldiers appeared and attacked. They received their +1/+1 bonus from IV and their +1/+0 bonus from HoB to make them 3/2, but they tapped when attacking. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I thought with vigilance the tokens should not have tapped to attack What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26
Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
